projectName: Process Library Catalog - Steampunk UI Final Refinement

decorativeFeatures: brass pipe borders with joints and valves
gear decorations at corners and intersections
ornate brass nameplates with rounded ends

uiComponents.header: ornate brass frame with centered title plaque
uiComponents.searchBar: brass-framed input with decorative magnifying glass
uiComponents.filterChips: brass toggle buttons with gear icons
uiComponents.cards: brass-cornered parchment cards with decorative frames

remainingFeedback: Card corners need more flowing scroll curves with inner flourishes
Botanical elements need more color variation/detail
Mechanical bees need slightly higher contrast in some areas
